data.title: Premier Hotel Pretoria
data.meta_description: Premier Hotel Pretoria provides everything you need for a luxury accommodation stay in the heart of South Africa’s capital city.
data.text:
Convenient, luxury accommodation in South Africa’s capital city, Pretoria.

Located opposite the Union Buildings, Premier Hotel Pretoria offers spectacular views of the city and jacaranda scattered streets. And for anyone coming to the city for business, this pristine hotel is in close proximity to the government departments, embassies, consulates, the University of Pretoria and shopping centres.

Offering comfortable and modern rooms and suits

Premier Hotel Pretoria boasts 118 rooms as well as state-of-the-art conference facilities, which makes the hotel perfect for business and leisure travellers alike. You can expect luxurious finishes in a comfortable, classic and spacious setting and booking a room with us can be done quickly online or by getting in contact with one of our friendly consultants.

Enjoy a sit down meal or snack on the poolside patio

The Ambassador Restaurant, conveniently located on the ground floor and open to the public, is the ideal place for all to relax and enjoy a sit down meal near the outdoor pool patio and bar areas. This is stellar experience and the perfect way to enjoy the pleasures of the hotel at your leisure.

Local Attractions

Enjoy uniquely South African architectural wonders like the Voortrekker Monument and Union buildings. Explore museums and local heritage sites for a look into South Africa’s richly diverse history or visit one of the area’s bustling shopping districts and malls.

2km Union Buildings

3km Hatfield Gautrain Station

8km Voortrekker Monument

9km Menlyn Park Shopping Centre

47km O.R. Tambo International Airport
